item.title: Even faster bash startup
item.description: I sped up bash startup from 165 ms to 40 ms. It’s actually noticeable. Why and how did I do it?
item.author: (Tomáš Janoušek)

item.title: Die Sendung mit der Maus: Die Sendung vom 22.11.2020 | ARD Mediathek
Booting from a vinyl record – BOGIN, JR.
item.description: Most PCs tend to boot from a primary media storage, be it a hard disk drive, or a solid-state drive, perhaps from a network, or – if all else fails – the USB stick or the boot DVD comes to the rescue… Fun, eh? Boring! Why don’t we try to boot from a record player for a change?

item.title: WhiteHat Jr And The Curious Case Of Disappearing Dissent | Forbes India
item.description: Multiple people who have criticised the kids coding startup's methods or marketing campaigns have found their posts swiftly wiped off the internet. Experts say this could be corporate censorship, which points to a larger debate around transparency in content moderation
item.author: (By Pankti Mehta Kadakia, Forbes India Staff)

item.title: X11 Library Sees Lots Of Fixes With libX11 1.7 Release

item.title: iPad Linux
item.description: Linux on the iPad isn't a reality yet, at least not like on a desktop platform. With hardware becoming more and more powerful every year, obsolete iPadsshould be allowed to continue to serve a purpose. Obsolete iPads could be affordable personal computers and useful for project builds. We believe Linux is the key to bring new life to these devices.
